description.p: Get the difference in hours between two date or time values.

prototypes.prototype: HoursBetweenDateTimes as N (DateTime1 as T, DateTime2 as T)

description.p: Returns the hours between two date or time values.

discussion.p: The HoursBetweenDateTimes function calculates the hours between two date or time values.

example.caption: HoursBetweenDateTimes() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, HoursBetweenDateTimes(Now(), AddMinutesToDateTime(Now(), 150)) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|3
